title: Fury Bowser

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - **Flame Breath**: Rampage attack a player, Torching them and all Visitors, Can only be used on nights 3, 7, 10 and 13.

fields.name: - **Fury**:
fields.value: Choose yourself as the normal Koopa attacker this night, Dealing a Torching Basic attack to a target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - All negative effects targeting you turn into a roleblock, Roleblock Immune while Breathing flames

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose Lord Bowser.

desc:
Post 1813
*The beast's fury has grown too strong. The light of the Cat Shines can no longer keep it at bay...*
